titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on Imidacloprid Pesticides.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
2/7/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce temporarily the duty on Imidacloprid Pesticides.
